sentences.en: A consortium plans to build a natural-gas pipeline from Russia to supply eastern Germany.
sentences.cn: 一家财团计划修建一条从俄罗斯向德国东部供应天然气的管道。

sentences.en: A single pipeline serves all the houses with water.
sentences.cn: 一条单管路给所有的房子供水.

sentences.en: Already in the pipeline is a 2.9 per cent pay increase for teachers.
sentences.cn: 教师的工资将上调2.9%，此事正在运作中。

sentences.en: Everything in the supply pipeline was draw forward to the battle.
sentences.cn: 供应线上的一切物资源源不断地运向前线.

sentences.en: From time to time a scraper is passed through the pipeline to remove this corrosion.
sentences.cn: 不时用清管器在油管内穿过,以清除这种锈蚀.

sentences.en: Important changes are already in the pipeline.
sentences.cn: 重大的变革已在酝酿之中.

sentences.en: In the above pipelines we started with some command that generated output and then piped that output through each stage of the pipeline.
sentences.cn: 在以上的管道线中，我们在开始时使用一些生成输出的命令，然后通过管道线的每个阶段导出输出。

sentences.en: Northern Pipeline was widely regarded as potentially applicable to administrative agencies as well as specialized courts.
sentences.cn: 有关人士普遍认为,“北方管道”案潜在地适用于行政机关以及专门法院两者.

sentences.en: Reccntly they have laid an underground pipeline.
sentences.cn: 最近,他们铺设了一条地下管道.

sentences.en: Recently they have laid an underground pipeline.
sentences.cn: 他们最近铺了一条地下管道.

sentences.en: The East - West oil pipeline is nearly half welded and laid.
sentences.cn: 东西贯通的输油管道已经差不多焊接和铺设好了一半.

sentences.en: The pipeline carries crude oil direct from the oil field to the harbour.
sentences.cn: 油管把原油从油田直接输往港口.

sentences.en: The pipeline links the refinery with the port.
sentences.cn: 管道将炼油厂与港口连接起来.

sentences.en: The pipeline supplies Jordan with 15 per cent of its crude oil.
sentences.cn: 该管道供给约旦15%的原油.

sentences.en: The two ends of the pipeline are connected with the radiator.
sentences.cn: 管道的两端与暖气片相连接.

sentences.en: They reported that the pipeline had ruptured.
sentences.cn: 他们报告说管道已经破裂了.

words.tran_cn: 吹笛的；平静的；乐声优雅的；尖声的
吹笛者；风笛手；管道工；绿鳍鱼；气喘的马
用管道输送；尖声唱（pipe的ing形式）

phrases.tran_cn: n. 天然气管线，煤气管线；气体管道
在进行中，在运输中，在生产中，在处理中
流水线运算，流水线操作；管线作业
泥浆输送管；输浆管道；煤浆管道

trans.tran_cn: 管道，输油管道，渠道，传递途径
trans.tran_en: a line of connecting pipes, often under the ground, used for sending gas, oil etc over long distances

trans.tran_cn: 用管道输送， 为…安装管道
